name: event
description: Event identifier, e.g. url path accessed from client.

name: product
description: Product issuing the event, 'scope-ui' or 'scope-probe' for now.

name: user_agent
description: HTTP User Agent (when the event is an http request).

name: client_id
description: Client's identifier, only applicable to the probe for now.

name: org_id
description: Organization identifier, to what service organization the event belongs. Can be joined to users table.
